<!--[if lte IE 7]><div class="disclaimer no-margin" id="disclaimer_box"><div class="large-95"><h3 style="color: #639d1f" class="large-100">BROWSER NÃO SUPORTADO</h3><p class="vspace" >O novo SAPO Vídeos foi otimizado para browsers modernos pelo que poderá experienciar problemas com o seu browser atual.  <br>Recomendamos que faça o download e instale a última versão de um dos browsers listados abaixo.<p><h3 style="color: #639d1f" class="large-100" >Browsers recomendados:</h3><div class="ink-grid"><div class="column-group gutters"><div class="large-20 small-33 content-center"><a     <section class="small-100 medium-100 large-100 user-header hide-small no-bk-pic "><div class="large-100 medium-100 small-100 ink-dropdown user-image-panel" style="border-top: 0px; background:url() no-repeat top left transparent; background-size:cover;"><img src="//thumbs.web.sapo.io/?pic=https://imgs.sapo.pt/sapoid/id2/avtr/720de77ca5b4a90bc147d40b3c22415b96f746a8/139603623931282252.PNG&crop=center&errorpic=transparent&W=75&H=75" alt="" class="avatar"></div><!-- user related --><ul class="unstyled user-info-panel"><li class="push-right"><a class="ink-button push-right rssfeed" href="//rd3.videos.sapo.pt/canalq/rss2" ><span class="icon-rss"></span></a></li><li class="push-right"></li><li><a class="username toggle" id="user_name" data-user-name="canalq" href="#" data-target="#profile-details">canalq<span class="icon-caret-down"></span></a></li><li><ul class="push-left unstyled user-numbers"><li><a href="/canalq/ultimos"><span class="count" id="user_total_videos">12885</span><span class="title">Vídeos</span></a></li><li class="push-left"><a href="/canalq/plays"><span class="count">81</span><span class="title">Playlists</span></a></li></ul></li></ul><div id="profile-details" class="xl-100 large-100 medium-100 small-100 profile-details column-group gutters hide-all"><span class="icon-caret-down"></span><hr /><div class="large-100 medium-100 small-100 description"><h5> Acerca dos meus vídeos :</h5><p>Nascido no dia 29 e Março de 2010, o Canal Q, das Produções Fictícias, é um canal de televisão essencialmente de entretenimento e de informação. É um canal em construção, mas sobretudo em desconstruçã</p></div></div><!-- end user related --></section><!-- SHOW SMALL PANEL--><section class="small-100 medium-100 large-100 user-header hide-all show-small no-bk-pic "><div class="large-100 medium-100 small-100 ink-dropdown user-image-panel" style="border-top: 0px; background:url() no-repeat top left transparent; background-size:cover;"><img src="//thumbs.web.sapo.io/?pic=https://imgs.sapo.pt/sapoid/id2/avtr/720de77ca5b4a90bc147d40b3c22415b96f746a8/139603623931282252.PNG&crop=center&errorpic=transparent&W=75&H=75" alt="canalq" class="avatar"></div><ul class="unstyled user-info-panel"><li class="push-right"></li><li><a class="username" data-user-name="canalq" href="/canalq" >canalq</a></li><li><ul class="unstyled user-numbers"><li><a href="/canalq/ultimos"><span class="count" id="user_total_videos">12885</span><span class="title">Vídeos</span></a></li><li class="push-left"><a href="/canalq/plays"><span class="count">81</span><span class="title">Playlists</span></a></li></ul></li></ul></section>

video_tooltip" data-tip-text=" Ver mais tarde"data-tip-where="down"data-tip-color="black"data-trackerlink="content|video|bt_watchlatter"><span class="icon-time"></span><span class="description hide-all"> Ver mais tarde</span></a><div class="share-tip hide-all"><p class="fake-tooltip" data-text=" Ver mais tarde"> <span class="icon-caret-down"></span>  Ver mais tarde</p></div></li><li><a href="javascript:void(0)" class="action-add-playlist video_tooltip" data-tip-text=" Adicionar a playlist"data-tip-where="down"data-tip-color="black"data-trackerlink="content|video|bt_addplaylist"><span class="icon-plus"></span><span class="description hide-all"> Adicionar a playlist</span></a><div class="share-tip hide-all"><p class="fake-tooltip" data-text=" Adicionar a playlist"> <span class="icon-caret-down"></span>  Adicionar a playlist</p></div></li><li class="report"><a href="javascript:void(0)" class="action-report video_tooltip"data-video-randname="4MyqjpF3WWNpiTCvNJ60"data-tip-text=" href="javascript:void(0)" class="action-share"data-video-randname="4MyqjpF3WWNpiTCvNJ60"data-video-title="Inferno T5 :: PROMO Ep.106"data-trackerlink="content|video|bt_share"><span class="icon-share"></span><span>  Partilhar</span></a></li></ul><div class="ink-shade fade"><div class="ink-modal" id="modal_share" data-trigger=".action-share" data-width="650px" data-height="700px" data-close-on-click="true"><div class="modal-header"><button class="modal-close ink-dismiss"></button><h4> Partilhar Vídeo: <small class="title hide-small" id="modalshare_video_title"></small></h4><form class="ink-form half-vertical-space"><fieldset class="control-group"><label for="modalshare_video_link"><strong> Link para o vídeo</strong></label><div class="control"><input class="copy-box" type="text" id="modalshare_video_link" value=""></div></fieldset></form></div><div class="modal-body"><form class="ink-form"><div class="ink-tabs top" data-active="#embed_bt"><ul class="tabs-nav"><li><a href="#embed_bt" data-trackerlink="content|video|modal_tab_embed" > Embed</a></li><li><a href="#social_bt" data-trackerlink="content|video|modal_tab_social" > Redes Sociais</a></li><li><a href="#email_bt" data-trackerlink="content|video|modal_tab_email"> Email</a></li></ul><fieldset id="embed_bt" class="tabs-content"><p><label for="iframe_text"><strong> Selecione as opções de personalização e copie o código</strong></label></p><div class="control-group"><ul class="unstyled control"><li><input id="modal_share_start_on_check" type="checkbox"><label for="modal_share_start_on_check"> Iniciar: </label><input type="text" value="00" size="2" maxlength="2" id="modal_share_start_time_h">&nbsp;h&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<input type="text" value="00" size="2" maxlength="2" id="modal_share_start_time_m">&nbsp;m&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<input type="text" value="00" size="2" maxlength="2" id="modal_share_start_time_s">&nbsp;s</li></ul></div><div class="column-group gutters"><div class="control-group large-20 medium-20 small-50"><label for="modal_share_width"> Largura:</label><div class="control"><input type="text" value="640" size="4" maxlength="4" id="modal_share_width"></div></div><div class="control-group large-20 medium-20 small-50"><label for="modal_share_height"> Altura:</label><div class="control"><input type="text" value="360" size="4" maxlength="4" id="modal_share_height"></div></div></div><div class="control-group"><ul class="unstyled control"><li><input id="modal_share_keep_aspect" type="checkbox" checked="check"><label for="modal_share_keep_aspect"> Manter proporção</label></li><li><input id="modal_share_showrelated" type="checkbox"><label for="modal_share_showrelated"> Não mostrar vídeos relacionados quando o vídeo terminar</label></li><li><input id="modal_share_autoplay" type="checkbox"><label for="modal_share_autoplay"> Reproduzir vídeo automaticamente (Auto play)</label></li><li><input id="modal_share_https" type="checkbox"><label for="modal_share_https"> Partilhar em https</label></li></ul></div><div class="control-group "><div class="control"><textarea id="iframe_text" cols="85" rows="4" class="copy-box" readonly></textarea></div></div></fieldset><fieldset id="social_bt" class="tabs-content column-group hide-all"><div class="large-50 medium-80 small-100 push-center top-space"><div class="large-33 medium-33 small-33 content-center"><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-trackerlink="content|video|modal_social_fb" ><span class="fb-share icon-facebook-sign icon-4x"></span></a></div><div class="large-33 medium-33 small-33 content-center"><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-trackerlink="content|video|modal_social_twitter" ><span class="twitter-share icon-twitter-sign icon-4x"></span></a></div><div class="large-33 href="javascript:void(0)">Cancelar</a></span></div></div></div><div class="ink-shade fade"><div class="ink-modal" id="modal_report" data-trigger=".action-report" data-width="550px" data-height="420px"><div class="modal-header"><button class="modal-close ink-dismiss"></button><h4> Denunciar Vídeo</h4></div><div class="modal-body"><form class="ink-form"><fieldset class="control-group"><h6> Indique-nos o motivo pelo qual quer denunciar este vídeo</h6><ul class="unstyled control"><li><input value="m18" name="reason" id="reason_m18" type="radio" checked><label for="reason_m18"> Este vídeo só deve ser visto por maiores de idade</label></li><li><input value="text" name="reason" id="reason_text" type="radio"><label for="reason_text"> Este vídeo é ilegal porque  :</label></li></ul><div class="control"><textarea rows="4" id="text_reason"></textarea></div></fieldset></form></div><div class="modal-footer"><button id="submit_modal_report" class="sapo-button blue
